thread.title: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of EMC Corp. of Commencement of an Investigation Concerning the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to Dell Inc. -- EMC
thread.title_full: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of EMC Corp. of Commencement of an Investigation Concerning the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to Dell Inc. -- EMC

title: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of EMC Corp. of Commencement of an Investigation Concerning the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to Dell Inc. -- EMC
text: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of EMC Corp. of Commencement of an Investigation Concerning the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to Dell Inc. -- EMC   Published on 2015-10-13 12:15:30 SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of EMC Corp. of... -- NEW YORK, Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Protecting the Rights of Shareholders. Protecting the Rights of Shareholders. <-  <- stripped tags -> NEW YORK , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The following statement is being issued by Levi & Korsinsky, LLP: To: All Persons or Entities who purchased EMC Corp. stock prior to October 12, 2015 . You are hereby notified that Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has commenced an investigation into the fairness of the sale of EMC Corp. (NYSE: [[]]) to Dell Inc. for $24.05 in cash per EMC Corp. share and a tracking stock in virtual software provider VMWare Inc. To learn more about the investigation and your rights, go to : [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTk2YkdzdU9XNXNMbU52YlM5bGJXTXRZMjl5Y0MxbGJXTmNJaUJ5Wld3OVhDSnViMlp2Ykd4dmQxd2lJSFJoY21kbGREMWNJbDlpYkdGdWExd2lQbWgwZEhBNkx5OTZiR3N1T1c1c0xtTnZiUzlsYldNdFkyOXljQzFsYldNOEwyRSt8]] or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2RHRnlaMlYwUFNkZllteGhibXNuSUdoeVpXWTlYQ0p0WVdsc2RHODZhbXhsZG1sQWVteHJMbU52YlZ3aUlISmxiRDFjSW01dlptOXNiRzkzWENJK2FteGxkbWxBZW14ckxtTnZiVHd2WVQ0PXw=]] or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972. There is no cost or obligation to you . Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York , New Jersey , Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firm's attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities lawsuits and have recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for aggrieved shareholders . For more information, please feel free to contact any of the attorneys listed below. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes. Levi & Korsinsky, LLP
